description:
Tree pruning of TPO trees.

Tree Preservation Application At:

13 Alwyne Road, Islington, London, N1 2HH

TPO Reference:

T 38– Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007
T 23– Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007
T 24– Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007


PO Number:

T110166

Work specifications:

1 x Sycamore (T38) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007 (located in the left corner of rear garden)
15 % crown thin, cut back to clear properties by 2 m and remove deadwood. 

1 x Sycamore (T23) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007(located next to the road)
Cut back to clear highway and remove deadwood.

1 x Sycamore (T24) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.332) 2007 (located next to the road)
Cut back to clear highway and remove deadwood.


Decision:

Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: The tree office has spoken to the owner of the trees as well as the Tree Surgeon. The application specifation was to thin all trees (X3) by 25 %. The tree officer has agreed that the only one tree will have a crown thin. Only T38 will have a 15 % crown thin. All trees will need to be deadwooded.
